## Updated Links:

1. **Chat & Meetings** → `/product/chat` (routes to `app/product/chat/page.tsx`)
2. **Files & Docs** → `/product/files` (routes to `app/product/files/page.tsx`) 
3. **AppBuilder** → `/product/appbuilder` (routes to `app/product/appbuilder/page.tsx`)
4. **Data & Dashboards** → `/product/data` (routes to `app/product/data/page.tsx`)
5. **Admin & Security** → `/security` (routes to `app/security/page.tsx`)

All the links now correctly correspond to the existing page.tsx files in their respective directories as defined in the navigation data. The AppBuilder link was already correct, so no changes were needed there.
